titleStmt.title: Tragi-comoedia being a brief relation of the strange, and wonderfull hand of God discovered at Witny, in the comedy acted there February the third, where there were some slaine, many hurt, and several other remarkable passages : together with what was preached in three sermons on that occasion from Rom. 1, 18 : both which may serve as some check to the growing atheisme of the present age / by John Rowe ...
titleStmt.author: Rowe, John, 1626-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L. Lichfield, for Henry Cripps,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
